0.text: Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and basic abilities deal 15 − 83 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) additional physical damage. This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

1.text: Gathering an Element with  Terrashape  resets Royal Privilege's per-target cooldown for enemies affected by Royal Privilege using a different Element (or no Element).

0.text: Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. Edge of Ixtal deals 150% damage against  monsters.

1.text: Gathering an Element with  Terrashape will  reset the cooldown and upgrades Edge of Ixtal into Elemental Wrath.

2.text: If cast during  Audacity's dash towards an enemy  champion and the target is within 150 units of Qiyana at the end of the dash, Edge of Ixtal will autonomously aim at the target.

0.text: Active: Qiyana hurls her blade in the target direction that blasts in a line upon hitting an enemy or maximum range. This consumes the current Element to empower the blade with an additional effect.

1.text: Enemies hit are dealt Edge of Ixtal's physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent enemies beyond the closest. Elemental Wrath deals 150% damage against  monsters.

2.text: Brush: The blade creates a grass field around Qiyana that lasts for up to 3 seconds, granting her  invisibility and  20% bonus movement speed until she attacks, casts an ability other than  Terrashape, or exits the field.

3.text: River: The blast  roots enemies hit for 0.5 seconds, then  slows them by 20% for 1 second.

4.text: Terrain: The blast deals  60% bonus damage against enemies below 50% of their maximum health.

2.marker: «Total Damage to targets beyond the first:

0.text: Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus attack range and bonus magic damage on her basic attacks  on-hit and basic abilities. While out-of-combat and moving near the Element currently being held, she gains  bonus movement speed.

1.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes up to 300 units towards the target location to gather the Element of the nearest  Brush,  River or  Terrain she targeted.

2.text: A target Element is required to cast this ability.

3.text: Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the  Terrain element upon respawning.

4.text: Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy and deals physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.

1.text: Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Qiyana sweeps a windblast in the target direction that  knocks back enemies hit, though not through terrain, and stops upon hitting Terrain.

1.text: The windblast creates a cascading shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of Terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, with the damage based on the target's health being capped against  monsters. The shockwave also  stuns enemies hit for 0.5 − 1 (based on proximity) seconds, and grants  sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.

0.content: 100 / 200 / 300 (+ 170% bonus AD) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)
+7% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 /  16) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  750

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Stats

+55 attack damage

+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

1.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes up to 300 units towards the target location to gather the Element of the nearest  Brush,  River or  Terrain she targeted.

2.text: A target Element is required to cast this ability.

3.text: Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the  Terrain element upon respawning.

4.text: Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy and deals physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.

1.text: Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Qiyana sweeps a windblast in the target direction that  knocks back enemies hit, though not through terrain, and stops upon hitting Terrain.

1.text: The windblast creates a cascading shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of Terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, with the damage based on the target's health being capped against  monsters. The shockwave also  stuns enemies hit for 0.5 − 1 (based on proximity) seconds, and grants  sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.

origin: 100 / 200 / 300 (+ 170% bonus ad) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)

Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus attack range and bonus magic damage on her basic attacks  on-hit and basic abilities. While out-of-combat and moving near the Element currently being held, she gains  bonus movement speed.
Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy and deals physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.

Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. Edge of Ixtal deals 150% damage against  monsters.

Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. Edge of Ixtal deals 150% damage against  monsters.
Enemies hit are dealt Edge of Ixtal's physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent enemies beyond the closest. Elemental Wrath deals 150% damage against  monsters.
Enemies hit are dealt Edge of Ixtal's physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent enemies beyond the closest. Elemental Wrath deals 150% damage against  monsters.
Terrain: The blast deals  60% bonus damage against enemies below 50% of their maximum health.
Terrain: The blast deals  60% bonus damage against enemies below 50% of their maximum health.
